title: Washington-Rochambeau National Historic Trail: News
body: News       Trail News and Updates The Washington Rochambeau Revolutionary Route National Historic Trail publishes monthly highlights with news and special events happening along the trail.  Check out the archive for previous highlights. For updates, trail event notifications, and to connect with others interested in the Washington-Rochambeau Revolutionary Route NHT, check out our Facebook page. See photos of Washington-Rochambeau Revolutionary Route NHT events on our Flickr account. If you have photos of past events and would like to see them included, please send us an email with the images, location, and brief description of the event.   Â         Trail Map Brochure The 2011 version of Washington-Rochambeau NHT brochure is currently available. Please contact us to request that we send you a copy by regular mail. Washington-Rochambeau Revolutionary Route National Historic Trail brochure  (Two pages, approximately 16.5 by 23.5 in, 6.42 MB PDF)
